question: Japanese government funding agency JICA has signed Rs 15,295 crore loan agreements with India, for projects in which sector?
explanation:
Japanese government funding agency JICA has signed Rs 15,295 crore loan agreements with India, for three mega rail infrastructure projects.
By these agreements, Rs 8,553 crore of the loan is proposed to be used for phase-1 of the Dedicated Freight Corridor, Rs 4,262 crore for Mumbai Trans Harbour Link Project (II) and Rs2,480 crore for the Mumbai Metro Line 3 Project (III).
